name: Songbird
description:
Songbird is a top down bullet hell-like action game developed for GMTK Jam 2020. 

Play as a magic bird with anger issues who must cast her spells using her saxophone. Each spell requires a melody to be played to activate. Be careful about taking too much damage though as otherwise you'll lose control and damage your saxophone!

Controls:

Move: WASD

Play Saxophone: Numpad keys 1 - 6

Change sheet music: Click on the name of the spell you would like to see the music for

All assets (minus the post processing effects :P) created during the jam

Programming and Art done by Trisol

https://trisol.itch.io/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfu8rZq80iNBFQwdR12YTqw

Music by Latona
